abstract: New York State Gaming Commission grants licenses to resort casinos Montreign in Monticello, Rivers Casino in Schenectady and Lago Resort & Casino in Tyre; casinos are expected to open in 2017 in competitive Northeastern market.
lead_paragraph: The action by a state board, four years after Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo first sought to expand gambling in New York, comes amid growing competition across the Northeast.

headline.main: New York Awards Licenses to 3 Casinos
headline.print_headline: State Panel Awards Licenses to 3 Casinos

snippet: The action by a state board, four years after Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo first sought to expand gambling in New York, comes amid growing competition across the Northeast.
